import cv2

for i in range(10):
    mol_data = train.iloc[i,:]
    print("image_id: "+mol_data["image_id"])
    
    # 
    mol = MolFromInchi(mol_data["InChI"])
    display(Draw.MolToImage(mol))
    
    image = cv2.imread(mol_data["file_path"])
    plt.imshow(image)
    plt.show()
